EmailTemplate.subject: Your Essential Information - Missing!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. The email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Please instead contact your local Staffing Team.
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Missing Essential Information!
We have noticed you have not completed one or more of the following categories. Please log into the Staffing Website to see what information is missing and complete this information as soon as possible.
Complete your information here: https://staffing.the-challenge.org/Login.aspx?ReturnUrl=%2fsecure%2f
Health Safety and Inclusion - Deadline 9th February
We will processing your information on the 9th Feb to ensure we have taken appropriate measures to accommodate for additional requirements.
Please contact your local staffing team if you are unable to complete this information by this date.
Emergency Contact Details - Deadline 9th February
We will processing your information on the 9th Feb so please update this section before this date.
Bank details - Deadline 19th February
We will be inputting staff into our payroll system on the 19th February. Please ensure you have entered your bank details correctly by this date or you will not be paid.
For further assistance in submitting your bank details, please contact staffing.support@the-challenge.org.
Tax details - Deadline 19th February
We will be processing all tax declarations and valid P45s we have received from staff on 19th February. This information is sent to HMRC who then dictate what your tax code is.
If you do not fill in your tax information before this date you will be put on an OT Tax code.
We cannot deal with any tax queries, so for more information about tax please contact HMRC.
If you have any further questions please contact your local staffing team, quoting the email reference number below in any correspondence.
Best Wishes
The Challenge Email Reference: CA 2.3
VISIT NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG NOW
